title: Garen border
body: I just purchased the god-king Garen border and it doesn't show up. wtf. Why did I spend all that time getting the tokens if I purchased it specifically for that border?!

replies.body:
Do you have the garen skin...?

The border is only for the skin...
I'm just going to ask this... But have you played God-King Garen since you got it? Cause btw it's a loading screen border.
